https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lvoBNz0Wsz24IHf1pHD1p1aYXXy.jpg Richard Avery, whose young son is kidnapped while they travel in India. Embarking on a desperate quest to rescue him, and with a beeper providing his only lead, Avery seeks help from unlikely sources, including a drug lord and a beautiful but dangerous woman named Julia. Beeper
